name: Ansible Control Node
postAttachCommand: curl -fsSL https://tailscale.com/install.sh | sh && sudo mkdir -p /var/lib/tailscale /var/run/tailscale && sudo pkill tailscaled || true && sudo tailscaled --tun=userspace-networking --state=/var/lib/tailscale/tailscaled.state --socket=/var/run/tailscale/tailscaled.sock & sleep 10 && for i in {1..10}; do if tailscale status >/dev/null 2>&1; then break; fi; sleep 1; done && sudo tailscale up --authkey="$TS_AUTHKEY" --accept-routes --accept-dns=false --force-reauth && tailscale status && pip install --user ansible && eval $(ssh-agent -s) && echo "$ANSIBLE_SSH_KEY" | tr -d '\r' | ssh-add - && echo 'Tailscale+Ansible ready!'
